inclusion.criterion: Body mass index equal or greater 25 kg/m²
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to sign the informed consent
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any chronic health conditions (e.g. chronic renal failure, autoimmune, heart, and liver disease)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Thyroid diseases or medications for its treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Medications known to affect total energy expenditure
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Use of steroids, immunosuppressants or non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Weight-loss medications, oral hypoglycemic agents or insulin and any medications that influence metabolic and/or inflammatory parameters
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, which may be a chronic health condition. They also have a history of surgery for weight loss, but it's not clear if this is relevant to the trial.
